extendedInfo.description: Found a nice verse or quote that inspired you so much that you want to see all the time in your home screen as customizable text widget? This app will help you to do just that.This simple app allows you to collect verses, quotes or arbitrary text either by inserting manually or by sending from other apps.These items can then be displayed as a home screen widget at random or specified order and interval of your choice. You can use this app to help you memorize verses (flashcard-like) or simply to motivate and inspire you every time. You can even use this to promote positive thinking or display affirmations. What's unique with this app is that it gives you full control of the content. You got to choose which items you want. Add, edit or delete entries anytime. Therefore, seeing only what you want to see without the unnecessary clutter.Features:- Customize individual widgets- Select custom widget background- Set transparency level of widget's background image- Select transition order- Ability to set update rate- Ability to set text size and color- Reconfigure existing widgets- Widget preview- Open list from the widget- Edit current item from widget- Pause/Resume transition- Random item button- Prev/Next item buttons (for non-random order)- Share item from the widget- Show/Hide controls of the widget- Manual sorting- Swipe gesture navigation- Searching- Import from CSV file- Import sample items (so that you don't need to start from scratch.)- Backup/Restore items- Share your collected items to othersPermissions:WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - to be able to save the backup file.Tags: bible, verse, quotes, reminder, text widget, personal collection, notes, motivation, inspiration, positive thinking,  affirmations

reviews.title: Exactly what I\'ve been looking for!
reviews.comment: Excellent app! Excellent support! It imported my csv of over 300 quotes perfectly, (once I followed the guidelines and sample provided by the dev in the app description). The only feature requests I have is the ability to dynamically size the text with the size of the widget instead of a static font size...and user control of the margin size...  THANK YOU, THANK YOU, THANK YOU!
reviews.author: Kay Klutchko

reviews.title: Awesome! Just what I wanted!

I cannot express how happy I am with your widget, the new .csv import feature, and how quickly you were able to roll out the upgrade. \302\240Thank you so much!!  Thoroughly happy!!
